sect1.title: CREATE PROCEDURE Syntax - External hosted procedures
sect1.para: Virtuoso provides a syntax shortcut for calling static method from hosted user defined types without first defining a Virtuoso external hosted user defined type:
This compiles into an functional equivalent of :
For more details see CREATE TYPE and Runtime hosting chapters.

example.title: CREATE PROCEDURE for a Java method:
example.para: Here is an example for CREATE PROCEDURE and the hosted Java VM:
example.programlisting: create procedure get_property (in x varchar) returns varchar language java external name 'java.lang.System.getProperty';
example.para: Here's how that procedure is called:
example.programlisting:
SQL> select get_property ('java.vm.name'); callret VARCHAR _______________________________________________________________________________
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM
